verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> or Song <S%H7892><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah. <S%H7141><s%> His foundation <S%H3248><s%> is in the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountains. <S%H2042><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> more than all <S%H3605><s%> the dwellings <S%H4908><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Glorious <S%H3513><s%> things are spoken <S%H1696><s%> of you, O city <S%H5892><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of Rahab <S%H7294><s%> and Babylon <S%H894><s%> to them that know <S%H3045><s%> me: behold <S%H2009><s%> Philistia, <S%H6429><s%> and Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> with Ethiopia; <S%H3568><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> man was born <S%H3205><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And of Zion <S%H6726><s%> it shall be said, <S%H559><s%> This and that man <S%H376><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> in her: and the highest <S%H5945><s%> himself <S%H1931><s%> shall establish <S%H3559><s%> her.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall count, <S%H5608><s%> when he writes <S%H3789><s%> up the people, <S%H5971><s%> that this <S%H2088><s%> man was born <S%H3205><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
As well the singers <S%H7891><s%> as the players <S%H2490><s%> on instruments shall be there: all <S%H3605><s%> my springs <S%H4599><s%> are in you.
